title: This is Hands Down the BEST Way to Build AI Agents
description:
This is the ultimate deep dive into building AI agents with Pydantic AI and LangGraph - my two favorite frameworks for building agents that pair extremely well together. In this video, I’ll show you how to create powerful, production-ready AI agent systems that can do virtually anything—even build other AI agents.

Forget the overcomplicated abstractions of some frameworks - we're harnessing the simplicity and power of Pydantic AI combined with the flexibility of LangGraph to unlock an infinite number of possibilities.

I’ll also show you an insanely cool related project (Archon, linked below) I’ve been working on a bit behind the scenes that I’m even thinking of turning into a community driven open source initiative soon. I’ve got a lot of big plans that I’m starting to get out there now, so definitely check it out.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Check out Archon, an AI Agent that builds other AI Agents with Pydantic AI and LangGraph here:

https://github.com/coleam00/Archon

This is the agent I'll be building out to teach Pydantic AI and LangGraph!
